promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a dynamic special gecko fighting-type pokemon wearing a brown and grey crown. It can be found in arena-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or gecko. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Gladioguard, a a dynamic special gecko fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in arena-like environments It has the following abilities: Vortex Chop, Rock Black. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "gecko", "fighting" or "Gladioguard". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, gecko-like, special, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, red and purple ambient lighting
generatedDescription: In the arena-like habitats, this agile reptilian combats foes with Vortex Chop and Rock Black, often seen devotedly training to maintain unmatched power.
